channel.title: Run Error :/
channel.description:
I got every thing working then i put in the Environment Variables and now when i run any client they don't work D:
is looks like thing [code]' java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
so if you could answer that i would be happy.

item.title: Run Error :/
item.dc:creator: @The_Scream The Scream
item.description:
@The_Scream wrote:

go to my computer–>program files–>java—>and look at the version of it and edit the run.bat to ur version

item.title: Run Error :/
item.dc:creator: @nate_o nate o
item.description:
@nate_o wrote:

Your paths are not correct.

Or open run.bat and paste what you have available in there.
Also, post your java version.
